name: dnser
description: Dnser is a package for working with top-level domains.

scripts.clean: rm -r node_modules package-lock.json lib/index.d.ts lib/index.js lib/server.js lib/server.d.ts lib/tlds.json
scripts.cbuild: npm run clean-install && npm run build
scripts.ctest: npm run clean-install && npm run build && npm run test

author: Pencil Domains <it@pencil.domains
